comment.body:
ran this through google translate

# have you ever tried cafe.loki?

is a nice microblogging platform on lokinet
, a bit like ZeroMe ... more refined, it seems, it has a bit of everything integrated: gallery, forum, groups, chat (session based, if I understand correctly) ...

I registered today, after verifying that on lokinet tablet it works well for me (not like on desktop)

if you register by referring to me through this link http: //cafe.loki/register? ref = Schizo I earn a little something ðŸ˜ƒ

on cafe.loki there is also the Market; I put my yarns up for sale ðŸ˜ƒ

======================================================

yes i have, but i dont use it all that much because it doesnt run well on my machine for whatever reason
session is great though i just wish more people used it
